title: WhatsApp : annual revenue 2012 to 2014
summary: This statistic described the WhatsApp annual revenue of WhatsApp to the gross domestic product of the United Arab Emirates from 2012 to 2013 and a forecast for 2013 .
The forecast of the WhatsApp annual revenue of WhatsApp to the Annual of the United Arab Emirates for 2013 was approximately 15.29 billion U.S. dollars .
